name: EARTH DEFENSE FORCE 5 - Wing Diver Weapon Starburst
detailed_description:
One of the EDF's most top-secret super weapons. It fires energy spheres that stop in mid-air and spawn super high-pressure plasma spheres. These spheres, affected by gravity, fall to the ground.
You can set the direction you wish to aim at by holding the attack button, and fire by releasing it. By firing it while in the air, you can control where it starts and where it activates, since your speed affects the direction you fire in.
